example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <Stack direction="column" align="center">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Right
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}>
        <Button disabled>Book</Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column" align="center">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Left
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip
        preferredPosition="left"
        content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}
      >
        <Button disabled>Book</Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column" align="center">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Bottom
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip
        preferredPosition="bottom"
        content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}
      >
        <Button disabled>Book</Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column" align="center">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Top
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip
        preferredPosition="top"
        content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}
      >
        <Button disabled>Book</Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Position
info.description: If you set a preferred position relative to the child, the tooltip will be placed there if there's room. Otherwise, preference is given in the order of: right, left, top, and bottom.
